seriesJson.title: In memoriam: Langston Hughes
seriesJson.description: A series about the noted American poet who died May 22, 1967. It features him reading his poetry at Columbia University during Spring 1964.

node.title: Part one
node.description: This program presents the first part of a tribute to poet Langston Hughes.

node.title: Part two
node.description: This program presents the second part of a tribute to poet Langston Hughes.
